  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bits
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300

short_description: The Last Defense is a 3D Tower Defense game ,where you play from the eyes of King Severin. Build and Update your defenses and try to push out the wave of corrupted creatures, that are invading trough multiple portals inside the kingdom. Help King Severin save his Kingdom from Doom.
